name: The 'log_disconnections' database flag for Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance is set to 'on'
query: { cloudSqlInstances( where: { engine: "postgresql" cloudProvider: "gcp" OR: [ { dbFlags_NONE: { name: "log_disconnections" } } { dbFlags_SOME: { name: "log_disconnections", value: "off" } } ] } ) { ...AssetFragment }}
